content.synopsis: The series revolves around a group of people who are on board in flight 710 from Beirut to Cairo. The passengers of the flight are mentally unstable, their stories will meet at some point in a suspense thriller
content.title: Al Rehla

content.synopsis: Souad Abdualla is coming back this Ramadan as a selfish woman. She does not care about her son and daughter dreams, and interests. Until when she will keep getting what she wants?
content.title: A'brat Share'a

content.synopsis: It’s a story set in a girl’s hostel, where girls from different cities reside together while trying their luck in having a future in Mumbai. An incident occurs that brings out their ‘fear of the unknown’ & their life changes forever.

content.synopsis: A series of comedic events that gathers a group of people on an Island and have to adapt in order to survive, and make their final decision in choosing the leader of the Island.
content.title: Al Waq Waq

content.synopsis: The story of a girl named Ganga, who becomes a widow on the same day as her marriage when her husband and her father, with whom she was very close, are killed in a riot on the bank of river Ganges in Varanasi
content.title: Qadary Bela Lawn 2

content.synopsis: Meshwar Omri is the story of Kalpana who struggles to fulfil the dreams and aspirations set by her mother, Kamla, a domestic worker who does everything she can to provide a decent life for her.
content.title: Meshwar Omri

content.title: Qadary w Nasibi

content.synopsis: Jodha Akbar is back with Season 4 only on Weyyak. This season of the historic drama focuses on the problems between Jodah And Jalal and how they face it!
content.title: Jodha Akbar 4

content.synopsis: Haifa Wehbe, a professional scammer falls in love with one of her victims. Will she surrender to her love or will her mind conquer?
content.title: La'net Karma

content.synopsis: The story revolves around the lives of Twinkle, Yuvraj and Konj, who at various points in their lives experience variety of emotions including love, betrayal, jealousy, hatred and obsession
content.title: Ghomoud Al Hob 2

content.title: Anjaana Anjaani

content.synopsis: Set in the small town of Bareily, Bitti is a free spirited young girl who lives life by her own terms and refuses to to be pressured into being married. Her life changes when she meets 2 boys, Chirag & Pritam.
content.title: Bareily Ki Barfi

content.synopsis: Devki, is a biology teacher. Arya, her stepdaughter studies in the same school but they share a frosty relationship. When Arya is involved in an unfortunate incident, Devki faces tough obstacles to get justice for her stepdaughter.
content.title: Mom

content.synopsis: Besharam is a story about Babli a small time car thief. His life changes when he falls in love with a woman whose car he has stolen
content.title: Besharam

content.title: Haseena Parkar

content.synopsis: Tamanchey is an aggressive, passionate acidic love story between two criminals whilst on the run from the law.

content.synopsis: A woman's struggle in this male dominated society that will leave her to embark on a quest of eternal marital bliss.

content.title: Nesr Al Sae'ed

content.synopsis: The story revolves around an Egyptian lawyer, he with the help of a group of lawyers establish an organization that provides solutions to the unfortunate citizens However, this organization quickly provokes the anger of a group of men in authority
content.title: Abo Omar Almasry

content.synopsis: Madhav meets a girl named Riya and they both fall in love. After struggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she finally agrees to be his "Half Girlfriend"
content.title: Half Girlfriend

content.synopsis: An attack leaves Yassen badly hurt. The police investigate everyone around him and discover that each one has a different motive and agenda. Nothing is as it seems as Yassen´s health improves.

content.synopsis: The real life story of three women who end up in prison during a turbulent time that changed the destiny of an entire nation.

content.title: Al Malik W Al Malika

content.synopsis: Weyyak presents Asrar Banaty the story of Balraj Asthana, who believes he can control the behavior of everyone in the house. However, each of his daughter carries her own secret which will be revealed with time. How will he handle this?
content.title: Asrar Banaty

content.synopsis: Hob Mashrot is about a young married couple, Jay & Aditi they land in the same office where they have to keep their marriage a secret. And they are suffering in their life .
content.title: Hob Mashrot 2

content.synopsis: Ibn Halal is a story about a man who comes from Upper Egypt to live in Cairo, but he finds that the life there is very difficult. His life will get worse when he is accused of a crime that he did not commit. Hebesha keeps trying to prove his innocence.
content.title: Ibn Halal

content.title: Fidya 2
